mapper.insert: insert into ecs_group_goods (parent_id, goods_id, admin_id, goods_price) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select parent_id, goods_id, admin_id, goods_price from ecs_group_goods
